game.name: Ikigai: An Alternate Cold War Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In a world where the east and the west have their histories switched, take control of the United Provinces of Kinshu, the foremost power during the most volatile era of its history, the cold war. In the midst of global conflicts, corruption, and conspiracy, your decisions shall mark your destiny.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In a world where the east and the west have their histories switched, take control of the United Provinces of Kinshu, the foremost power during the most volatile era of its history, the cold war. In the midst of global conflicts, corruption, and conspiracy, your decisions shall mark your destiny.
